actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend Title 38, United States Code, to increase the rate of compensation payable to veterans who have lost or lost the use of both upper extremities as the result of service-connected disability.

summary.text: Amends wartime disability compensation provisions to increase the compensation rate for certain arm and leg losses and for blindness or eye loss.

titles.title: A bill to amend Title 38, United States Code, to increase the rate of compensation payable to veterans who have lost or lost the use of both upper extremities as the result of service-connected disability.
